sections: Just a quick reminder that our subscriber-only Daily Poster anniversary celebration starts at 7pm ET (4pm PT) today (4/14).

My staff and I will be dishing on what it’s like to launch a grassroots news outlet, discussing lessons learned over the past year, and unveiling exciting plans for our future. There will also be lots of time for questions from attendees, as well as input on what kinds of stories people would like to see us cover.
Remember, these live chat events are exclusively for
supporting subscribers, who are able to watch the broadcast live and ask questions and provide feedback in real time.
Please register for the event ahead of time by using the link and password below in the login information section. And please start posting your questions in the chat room now!
DETAILS AND LOGIN INFO FOR 4/14 EVENT:
The Daily Poster Anniversary Celebration live chat will take place on Wednesday 4/14 at 7:00pm ET (4:00pm PST).
To participate, subscribers should go to this link:
(Note: If subscribers miss the event, they can always view a replay at the link above by using the same password.)
• Go to the event link and register for the event right now so that you don’t have to deal with login/registration issues at the time of the event.
• Copy and paste the event URL into your browser and copy and paste the event password in. The event URL is: https://www.crowdcast.io/e/dailyposteranniversary
• If possible, please try to use a regular desktop or laptop computer, and use the Chrome browser. You can read more about browser compatibility here.
• If you want to participate using an iPhone or iPad, you can download Crowdcast’s app here.

• If you are connected to the live broadcast and have connectivity issues, you should refresh your browser; hit "Help" at the top of the screen (which enters you into compatibility mode); and click the settings cog icon on the bottom right corner and switch to 360p resolution.
